transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sarik sir good morning. 
Customer: Haan ji hello.
Executive: Abhi maine aapki recording suni hai, aawaz aa rahi hai? Sir mujhe yaha pe abhi maine pura catalog aapka check kiya mujhe medicine ka to koi bhi buylead nazar nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Are madam aap maine aapko khud screenshot bheja ki mai jhooth bol raha hu mai abhi aapko ek aur screenshot bhejta hu.
Customer: Usme bhi yahi sab hai matlab.
Executive: Anti cancer medicines wala bol rahe hai aap?
Customer: Dekhiye mai waha jo buyleads ka page hai waha pe se maine aapko screenshot bheja hai.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Sir aapka yaha pe ek product hai hexagonal glass and metal table top terrarium for indoor plants.
Executive: Theek hai? Ye ek aapka product hai jiski mapping yaha pe ki hui hai anti cancer medicines me. Isi liye ye buylead aapke paas aayi hai to ye hame theek karna padega. Mapping hi yaha pe galat ho rakhi hai aur aap mere paas kal hi aaye hai first time to bina baat kiye ya bina abhi aapne mujhe bataya.
Customer: Planter me aur medicine me fark nahi hai kya?
Executive: To sir maine aap mujhe aap bataye na kal hi to mere paas aaye hai aisa to nahi hai aap mere paas kaafi saalo se aur ye cheeze ek saal se chal rahi hai problem abhi to aapka new host hua hai na sir. To wo aap mujhe batayenge tabhi to theek hoga yaha se.
Customer: Ji to ye planter ko.
Executive: Theek ho gaya ye ab ab aapko medicine ka koi bhi buylead nahi aayega. Aur isme kya not relevant hai wo bhi bataiyega mai check kar leti hu.
Executive: Kal aapko mai video meet me yahi to dikha rahi thi na sir aap mapping bata rahi hu aap bataye kis cheez me deal karte hai ya nahi.
Customer: Ye to pehle hi mai wo mapping hi to mai aapko check kara rahi thi.
Executive: Haan ji aisa hai.
Executive: Hmm. Ek baar aap page ko refresh kariye.
Executive: Refresh karke aap dekhiye medicine ki aa rahi hai ya nahi ek baar.
Customer: Call pe hu.
Customer: Achcha dekhiye jo maine aapko bataya mobile pe to aata hi hai notification wo to chalo nahi aa raha lekin mail pe jo aata hai to Delhi aap keh rahi hai abhi local preferences hai to Delhi ki jo leads hai uska bhi mail bhi nahi aaya mere paas notification mobile me bhi nahi aaya. Dekhiye jaise ye hai antique Moroccan lantern.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai mail pe bhi iska buylead ka notification mail pe bhi nahi aaya aur mobile pe bhi nahi aaya ye to panel pe show kar raha hai. Kyunki jab jo Delhi aap keh rahi hai preferences hai to Delhi wala to aa jana chahiye na notification mail pe.
Executive: Preferences to kal aapne hata diya tha sir.
Customer: Nahi preferences me hata diya tha abhi bhi abhi bhi waha show yahi kar raha hai na local preferences hai ye. Waha pe yahi dikha raha hai ki bhi hata diya.
Executive: Haan local likha hua hai isi isiliye bol raha hu preferences me ek second ek second ek baar check kariye aap.
Executive: Haan jaise mai buylead pe gayi maine relevant recent pe kyunki buylead jo consume karna hai hamesha recent tab se karna hai theek hai. Aap pan India deal karte hai maine India ka filter lagaya hai. Abhi mujhe jo yaha pe first buylead show ho rahi hai aap bhi call karenge to aapko bhi same show hoga. Ye hai aapka photo frame Pt. Jawahar Lal Nehru photo frame. Theek hai Kolkata se hai ye buylead. Dusra mujhe Pune se show ho raha hai teesra Nagpur se hai chautha Hyderabad hai Pune.
Customer: Madam mai dekh raha hu mai ek minute.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Recent pe mai dekh raha hu India ka filter aapne lagaya.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Kolkata brown wooden glass wo glass box photo frame lekin abhi ek terrarium ka hai aap short list me dekhiye shayad. Moroccan lantern short list me hoga.
Customer: Haan antique Moroccan lantern. Iska mujhe na hi mail pe prapt hua notification na hi waise.
Customer: Email pe bhi jaake check kar leta hu mai.
Executive: Lantern wala bola aapne ek baar pura bataiye naam.
Customer: Antique Moroccan lantern ye.
Executive: Ye kaha ka hai?
Customer: Madam Delhi ka hai to jab local preference preference local hai abhi automatically hai wo ya pata nahi kaise.
Executive: Local aapka kuch bhi set nahi hai yaha pe aapko buylead pan India ki aayegi agar local me wo buylead available hai to local ki aa rahi hai.
Customer: Nahi aap dekh lo aapke kehne se local lag raha hai wo.
Customer: Meri baat suniye ek minute aap bataiye.
Customer: Ye buylead preference me dekhiye aap.
Customer: Buylead buylead preference me aaiye desktop me yaha likha hai your current location preference your current location preference local. Dekho aap likha hua hai.
Executive: Aapne buylead abhi jo consume ki hai theek hai aap jo keh rahe hai theek hai mai samajh gayi ek second sir ek minute dijiye.
Executive: Hmm. Aaj 14 hai aaj aapne ek buylead consume ki hai jo ki hai aapka Bhavnagar se right?
Customer: Wo to Gujarat se wo to maine search karke aur panel pe show kar rahi thi.
Executive: Theek hai. To ye kal kiya tha Jamnagar ka. Sir ek cheez mai kuch discuss kar rahi hu aap mujhe confirm kariega. Jamnagar se kiya tha aapne fir 12 tarikh ko kiya tha Asansol se hai na aur fir 12 tarikh ko ek aur kiya tha aapne Satara se. Right? Fir Lucknow aur Gorakhpur.
Executive: Bhubaneshwar aap jo deal aap jo buylead consume kar rahe hai wo to pan India use kar matlab pan India ki hi consume kar rahe hai kyunki mujhe jaise Aligarh ho gaya Gurgaon.
Executive: Gurgaon. Haan to pan India ka hi aap buylead consume kar rahe hai to waha pe ek second mai dusra ek baar catalog check kar leti hu. Ek minute dijiyega. Dusre client ka mai check karungi.
Customer: Mai aapko screenshot bhejta hu ek minute itni hi der me.
Executive: Theek hai haan ek baar bhejiye mai dekh bhi leti hu aur mai ek baar dusre client ka check kar rahi hu ek minute rukiye aap.
Executive: Ek baar na aawaz aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Hello aap abhi system pe hai kya aap?
Customer: Ji haan wo.
Executive: Mai keh rahi thi system pe hai kya aap abhi?
Customer: Bataiye mai waise to bahar hi hu aaj bhi kyunki.
Executive: Mai apne senior ke saath ek baar video meet join kar rahi hu hai na jo buyleads ka problem aa raha hai wo ek baar discuss karte hai aap apne side se screen share kariega pehle kyunki mere me kuch cheeze alag nazar aa rahi hai aapme kuch cheeze alag nazar aa rahi hai abhi aapne jo mujhe local wala bola wo bilkul sahi bola.
Customer: Whatsapp pe bhi share ho jaati hai screen waise to.
Executive: Whatsapp nahi sir whatsapp call hame allow nahi hai na but haan jo hum phone se video meet chalta hai na usme bhi screen share hota hai ek baar aap dekhiye hota hai ki nahi mai aapko link bhej deti hu.
Customer: Ek minute permission dekh leta hu.
Executive: Permission dekh leta hu ek minute mai. Haan dekh lijiye. Kaunsa phone hai waise?
Customer: Phone mera Samsung ka hai.
Executive: Samsung me allow karna padta hai screen share karne ke liye ek baar.
Customer: Haan to aap allow to karna padta hai lekin.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads on mail.

- Customer is seeing local preferences are still enabled.

- Customer received irrelevant buyleads related to medicine.



Resolution:

- Executive fixed the mapping issue for irrelevant buyleads.

- Executive confirmed the customer is consuming pan India buyleads.

- Executive offered to join a video meet to resolve issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a video meet link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, preferences, mapping, notification
